title: New free champion rotation: Ezreal, Fiora, Graves and more!

replies.body:
Hi Thane,

Although new champions will not be free for the first week, one of our goals with the champion rotation is to allow players to preview all champions eventually :)

Check out this thread if you'd like more info around how we choose the weekly free champions: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=46045
this going to be a week of hell....{{champion:24}}
